SocialMediaPosting.headline: Mrs. Ciara Was’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope for all students to feel seen, heard, represented, and supported…”

– Mrs. Ciara Was, Kindergarten Educator @Seneca_Valley @ConnoValleyElem https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2021/students-feel-seen-heard-represented-supported/
